title: My Sister Has a Different Father & My Mom Wants To Keep It a Secret
description:
In this episode, we talk to a man who thinks the problem in his marriage is strictly money-related (spoiler alert: it’s not). After that, we dive into overcoming the fear of marriage after a messy divorce and talk through some major drama around a mother who’s lying to her daughter about who her real father is.
  My wife and I are fighting about money
 Previously divorced and now I'm scared to get married again
 My sister has a different father & my mom wants to keep it a secret
 Lyrics of the Day: "Them Bones" - Alice in Chains
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.

  BetterHelp
